about_the_game:
My Fantasy Hostess Club is a twist on the management and turn-based RPG genre where you command your hostesses to charm customers with their social skills. Your task is to revive the popularity and standing of the infamous Opulence Haven Hostess Club!


  • Choose how your hostesses will respond to their customers. Order food or drinks, entertain them using exceptional social skills, or simply talk it out to keep them company
  • Each hostess has a unique personality, and you must match their quirks with the customer’s preferences to initiate smooth-sailing hosting sessions.

Initiate Marketing Campaigns


Cooperate with merchants in the city of Limerence to launch marketing campaigns like hosting fashion shows or emceeing a Pop Festival to boost your Club’s popularity!
  • Sell limited edition merchandise for your Club, initiate photoshoots for a magazine, and convince Limerence’s merchants during meetings to support your business
  • Host Club Meets where your hostesses can meet their fans while you make sure the event flourishes
  • Building strong social networks will reward you both Fairies and Prestige, two of the most important currencies to raise your Club to new heights

Hang Out With Your Favorite Hostess


Taking breaks from work is important so exploring the city and hanging out with the hostesses can take your mind off the usual work grind. Who knows? You might also find love down the line.
  • Hang out with your Club’s hostesses to learn more about their likes, concerns, and stories.
  • Deepening your relationships with Opulence Haven’s hostesses may teach them more skills that can be used during hosting sessions

Secrets

A mystery is brewing within Opulence Haven as Limerence’s Intelligence Agency is on the hunt for your Club’s suspicious activities. What you find in the city may shine the truth on what really happens behind the scenes. Can you find all the clues?

content_descriptors.notes: Customers may order drinks and images of alcohol are depicted on the map. A vague insinuation of non-explicit romantic activity ensues in the background during some scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
